name: Visions of the Past: You Made a Friend
description: Rox has orders from Rytlock to secure assets at the devourer hatchery northwest of the town of Nolan in Diessa Plateau, currently under threat by the Molten Alliance. [This mission is now playable in Living World Season 1: Episode 1]
requirement: Help Rox defend the hatchery...and find a new friend in the process.
